DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate Low Density Lipoprotein-Cholesterol ( LDL-C ) lower effect PF-04950615 administer subcutaneously monthly interval , twice monthly interval subject high cholesterol whose LDL-cholesterol > /=80 mg/dL background treatment statin .
DOC.brief_title: Monthly And Twice Monthly Subcutaneous Dosing Of PF-04950615 ( RN316 ) In Hypercholesterolemic Subjects On A Statin
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive stable dose ( least 6 week ) statin continue dose statin duration trial . Lipids meet follow criterion background treatment statin 2 screen visit occur screen least 7 day prior randomization Day 1 : Fasting LDLC great equal 80 mg/dL ( 2.31 mmol/L ) ; Fasting TG le equal 400 mg/dL ( 4.52 mmol/L ) . Subject 's fasting LDLcholesterol must great equal 80 mg/dL ( 2.31 mmol/L initial screen visit , value second visit within 7 day randomization must lower 20 % initial value meet eligibility criterion trial . Participation study within 3 month current study begin and/or study participation . Severe acute chronic medical psychiatric condition laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result , judgment investigator , would make subject inappropriate entry study . Pregnant female ; breastfeed female ; male females childbearing potential use highly effective contraception agree continue highly effective contraception least 63 day last dose investigational product . History cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure ( eg , MI , stroke , TIA , angioplasty ) past 6 month . Congestive heart failure ( CHF ) , NYHA functional class III IV . Poorly control type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus ( define HbA1c > 9 % ) . Poorly control hypertension .
